alert.note: Alert for Big Island Summit (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 13 at 10:52AM HST until April 13 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY UNTIL THIS EVENING FOR THE BIG ISLAND SUMMITS... .Periods of freezing rain mixed with light snow will continue through this afternoon. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Freezing rain occasionally mixed with light snow. Snow accumulation around one inch and ice accretion around one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Big Island Summits. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory means that periods of snow, sleet, or freezing rain will cause travel difficulties. Be prepared for slippery roads and limited visibilities and use caution while driving.
